Room.Name: Overland Drive
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Overland Drive, south of the Administration Complex.
Room.LongDescription: The Administration Complex houses the Oceancrest Detention and Rehabili- tation Center, the Mayor's Office and the Ministry of Order. All in one city block, this allows the administration to concentrate their work to a limited area instead of having to be spread out all over the city. On the south is the Dillsdale Memorial Park and the Ministry of Truth.
